newProject.description: We develop ideas that help improve life in the Czech Republic through IT, have no commercial alternative and are sustainable. Do you have such a project, or are you working on it but lack expert volunteers?
newProject.title: I have project idea

panelVolunteer.description: Developer? Projectionist? Marketer? Projects work best because of the diversity of teams and the sharing of experiences. If you have the desire and the time, whether an hour or ten a week, join in.
panelVolunteer.title: I want to be a volunteer

newsletter.inputError: Please enter a valid email address.
newsletter.invalidEmailError: Please enter a valid email address.
newsletter.note: Want to know what we're working on? Once a month, we'll recap what's been happening in the community and what's coming up.
newsletter.serverError: Something went wrong, please try again.
newsletter.subscribed: You're already with us! We have successfully registered your email to our newsletter.
newsletter.title: Newsletter

metadata.description: We are a community of top developers, designers and product people who want to use their free time to help state and non-governmental organizations and make the Czechia a better place to live.
metadata.title: Česko.Digital - changing Czechia for the better through ones and zeroes

efficiency.perex: We do not waste people’s time or financial resources. We focus on quick solutions to real problems using technology.
efficiency.title: Efficiency

main.perex: We do not waste people’s time or financial resources. We focus on quick solutions to real problems using technology.
main.title: Our Values

openness.perex: We take pride in open communication and access to information and data. We speak up and ask when we do not know. With honesty and respect.
openness.title: Openness

participatory.perex: It’s easy for everyone to get involved regardless of location or time because of the willingness and help of others in the community.
participatory.title: Collaboration

professionalism.perex: We are professionals  that are learning from professionals, inspiring each other beyond our community. We are clear on our expectations from each other.
professionalism.title: Professionalism

users.perex: We use technology, as a mean not as an objective, to design solutions for real end-user needs.
users.title: Users in the main role

homepage.subtitle: We are a community of top developers, designers and production people who want to use their free time to help state and non-governmental organizations and make Czechia a better place to live.
homepage.title: Changing Czechia for the better through ones and zeroes

contribute.note: Do you have any questions? Read
contribute.title: Contribute

projects.description: Thanks to expert volunteering, we can achieve great things and change life in the Czech Republic for the better. See how we do it.
